entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @FLOTUS @realDonaldTrump @POTUS @IvankaTrump assistant. 1600 Pennsylvania Ave is a new hot spot for #Covid19 due to not practicing self isolation, sense of entitlement with testing, no care for the staff like the rest of this country. We are not untouchable from this disease. Are you and a select few?
